tossup_question: -   –  What reagent could be used to transform ethanoic acid into acetyl chloride?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Hydrogen chloride
X) Sodium chloride
Y) Thionyl chloride
Z) Magnesium chloride
bonus_question: -   –  What is the oxidation state of chromium in the coordination compound of charge +3 that is formed from the reaction of five ammonia ligands and one chloride ligand with the central chromium ion?
